This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.

You will be exposed to High-Speed I/O protocols such as PCIe, DDR5, and PAM4 Ethernet, which are a part of our Ethernet Infrastructure Processing Unit (Intel® IPU) and Foundation NIC (FNIC) Ethernet product lines. We propose a dynamic and flexible workplace position, working directly with highly capable design, system, and pre/post-silicon teams within the organization.     The Network & Edge Group brings together our network connectivity and edge into a business unit chartered to drive technology end to end product leadership. It's leadership Ethernet, Switch, IPU, Photonics, Network and Edge portfolio is comprised of leadership products critically important to our customers.  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance. title: Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer
description: We’re seeking an experienced Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer (ML oriented), who will be integral to the data science feature development process, working in tandem with data engineering. You will design machine learning pipelines, apply algorithms to generate predictions and tackle data set challenges, and develop the first-ever, real-time corporate credit score platform. This isn't just another job. you'll be a key part of an exciting, experienced team in a fast-paced environment. You will:  Build forecasting/prediction models from scratch (POC) to production-ready Work closely in aligning the product, research, and development teams in crafting the product, increasing product effectiveness Take a critical role in the research process for finding the best market solutions for defined business problems Provide guidance to the R&D team and product teams  You have:  2+ years of experience as a Senior Software Engineer (ML), Machine Learning Engineer, Data Engineer, or in a similar role 4+ years of hands-on experience in engineering with Python Minimum 3-4 years of relevant experience: SQL complex queries (aggregations, analysis, etc.), as a strong cloud architect Degree in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, or equivalent experience Profound analytical skills and true love for data Extensive background in statistical analysis

title: Module Lead - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jul 11, 2023 Role Number:200490066 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops camera based sensing systems such as the user facing cameras, the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the eye tracking system on Apple Vision Pro. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The primary responsibility for this role is design and delivery of cutting edge camera and depth sensing modules, from concept through production ramp. Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. Responsibilities include: - Multi-functional leadership of optical, electrical and mechanical design teams to develop and integrate depth/camera hardware into products - Concept definition, design, and detailed trade studies for laser projectors, camera optics, sensors, and module packaging - Documentation of module-specific design, test, and manufacturing requirements - Leadership of international manufacturing partners for module design evaluation, prototype builds, and qualification - Leadership of electro-optical module test definition and validation in Apple labs and at manufacturing sites - Detailed failure analysis of any issues affecting functionality and performance at module and product level - Frequent reporting to executive and multi-functional teams on development status of module development

This is a full time position based in our Tel Aviv office with a hybrid work model.

To learn more, visit innovid.com or follow us on LinkedIn or Twitter. title: AI Product Analyst student for Artificial Intelligence Group, Intel
description: Job Description  The AI Solutions Group is Intel's internal AI group. It is a global team of over 200 experts that uses AI to upgrade and transform Intel's critical operations. The group develops and deploys AI solutions across the company, from processor architecture and design, through manufacturing to sales. This yields both more then 1B of annual value for Intel and better products for its customers. Our AI Product Analysts Intel's AI product experts are essentially rock stars-they combine deep AI knowledge with product management best practices to create innovative and high value AI based products at scale. Our AI product experts engage with our customers to identify high business value problems that can be solved using AI, defining creative and high-end solutions that our data scientists and machine learning engineers can create. They also conduct deep data analysis using state-of-the-art technologies, collaborating with our data scientists to identify, create and evaluate the best algorithms to solve problems. Working diligently with our customers, our product analysts help implement and drive the highest business value possible from our solutions.               Intel's Information Technology Group (IT) designs, deploys and supports the information technology architecture and hardware/software applications for Intel. This includes the LAN, WAN, telephony, data centers, client PCs, backup and restore, and enterprise applications. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

description: Summary Posted: Jul 11, 2023 Role Number:200490066 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops camera based sensing systems such as the user facing cameras, the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the eye tracking system on Apple Vision Pro. Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. This position offers the opportunity to have a real impact in an influential, technology-focused company impacting product lines that power the most advanced data centers in the world. title: Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer
description: We’re seeking an experienced Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer (ML oriented), who will be integral to the data science feature development process, working in tandem with data engineering. You will design machine learning pipelines, apply algorithms to generate predictions and tackle data set challenges, and develop the first-ever, real-time corporate credit score platform. This isn't just another job. you'll be a key part of an exciting, experienced team in a fast-paced environment. You will:  Build forecasting/prediction models from scratch (POC) to production-ready Work closely in aligning the product, research, and development teams in crafting the product, increasing product effectiveness Take a critical role in the research process for finding the best market solutions for defined business problems Provide guidance to the R&D team and product teams  You have:  2+ years of experience as a Senior Software Engineer (ML), Machine Learning Engineer, Data Engineer, or in a similar role 4+ years of hands-on experience in engineering with Python Minimum 3-4 years of relevant experience: SQL complex queries (aggregations, analysis, etc.), as a strong cloud architect Degree in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, or equivalent experience Profound analytical skills and true love for data Extensive background in statistical analysis

title: Data and Insights Analyst

We are seeking a full-time Data and Insights Analyst to join our team and support the development and execution of both our CX and Market research practices. This role provides a great opportunity for a curious, self-starter to become part of a high-performing team, and implement a hands-on approach to data exploration, manipulation, and database extraction automation. This will help our clients with mapping and documenting various data structures and platforms, eventually creating a curated, more approachable pattern of data retrieval. This is a full time position based in our Tel Aviv office with a hybrid work model.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.

title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

title: Module Lead - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jul 11, 2023 Role Number:200490066 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops camera based sensing systems such as the user facing cameras, the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the eye tracking system on Apple Vision Pro. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The primary responsibility for this role is design and delivery of cutting edge camera and depth sensing modules, from concept through production ramp. Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. Responsibilities include: - Multi-functional leadership of optical, electrical and mechanical design teams to develop and integrate depth/camera hardware into products - Concept definition, design, and detailed trade studies for laser projectors, camera optics, sensors, and module packaging - Documentation of module-specific design, test, and manufacturing requirements - Leadership of international manufacturing partners for module design evaluation, prototype builds, and qualification - Leadership of electro-optical module test definition and validation in Apple labs and at manufacturing sites - Detailed failure analysis of any issues affecting functionality and performance at module and product level - Frequent reporting to executive and multi-functional teams on development status of module development

title: Backend Software Engineer - Air Platform
description: NVIDIA has been redefining computer graphics, PC gaming, and accelerated computing for more than 25 years. It’s an outstanding legacy of innovation that’s motivated by extraordinary technology —and amazing people. NVIDIA is looking for an experienced Python Developer to join our Air team – the Digital Twin for Data Center Simulation web application. To learn more, visit https://air.nvidia.com. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications. This position offers the opportunity to have a real impact in an influential, technology-focused company impacting product lines that power the most advanced data centers in the world. We have crafted a team of outstanding people, whose mission is to push the frontiers of what is possible today and define the platform for the future of data center simulation and design. What you'll be doing:

title: Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer
description: We’re seeking an experienced Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer (ML oriented), who will be integral to the data science feature development process, working in tandem with data engineering. You will design machine learning pipelines, apply algorithms to generate predictions and tackle data set challenges, and develop the first-ever, real-time corporate credit score platform. This isn't just another job. you'll be a key part of an exciting, experienced team in a fast-paced environment. You will:  Build forecasting/prediction models from scratch (POC) to production-ready Work closely in aligning the product, research, and development teams in crafting the product, increasing product effectiveness Take a critical role in the research process for finding the best market solutions for defined business problems Provide guidance to the R&D team and product teams  You have:  2+ years of experience as a Senior Software Engineer (ML), Machine Learning Engineer, Data Engineer, or in a similar role 4+ years of hands-on experience in engineering with Python Minimum 3-4 years of relevant experience: SQL complex queries (aggregations, analysis, etc.), as a strong cloud architect Degree in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, or equivalent experience Profound analytical skills and true love for data Extensive background in statistical analysis

title: Data and Insights Analyst
description: OGC is a boutique research and consulting agency specializing in data-driven strategy, quantitative analytics, and Customer Experience (CX) program design and optimization. We work with some of the world’s largest organizations across a variety of industries, including Financial Services, Specialty Retail, Telecommunications, Hospitality and Software, helping them to gain a deep understanding of their customers, develop actionable insights, and improve business processes.  We are seeking a full-time Data and Insights Analyst to join our team and support the development and execution of both our CX and Market research practices. This role provides a great opportunity for a curious, self-starter to become part of a high-performing team, and implement a hands-on approach to data exploration, manipulation, and database extraction automation. This will help our clients with mapping and documenting various data structures and platforms, eventually creating a curated, more approachable pattern of data retrieval. This is a full time position based in our Tel Aviv office with a hybrid work model.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

description: We are looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our leading technology consulting team. description: Citi Innovation Lab in Tel Aviv is where dynamic projects are cultivated. The lab provides thought-leadership, technological solutions, and innovation to Citi’s global banking business. The AI/NLP group is the center of revolutionizing Citi's approach to handling data: including automated document processing, information and entity extraction, summarization, as well as data analysis based chatbots. We are actively working on developing and introducing cutting edge technologies, including LLMs. Combined text and image synergies and more. Technology Applications Development Full time

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.

title: AI Product Analyst student for Artificial Intelligence Group, Intel
description: Job Description  The AI Solutions Group is Intel's internal AI group. It is a global team of over 200 experts that uses AI to upgrade and transform Intel's critical operations. The group develops and deploys AI solutions across the company, from processor architecture and design, through manufacturing to sales. This yields both more then 1B of annual value for Intel and better products for its customers. Our AI product experts engage with our customers to identify high business value problems that can be solved using AI, defining creative and high-end solutions that our data scientists and machine learning engineers can create. Working diligently with our customers, our product analysts help implement and drive the highest business value possible from our solutions. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

title: Module Lead - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jul 11, 2023 Role Number:200490066 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops camera based sensing systems such as the user facing cameras, the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the eye tracking system on Apple Vision Pro. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The primary responsibility for this role is design and delivery of cutting edge camera and depth sensing modules, from concept through production ramp. Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. Responsibilities include: - Multi-functional leadership of optical, electrical and mechanical design teams to develop and integrate depth/camera hardware into products - Concept definition, design, and detailed trade studies for laser projectors, camera optics, sensors, and module packaging - Documentation of module-specific design, test, and manufacturing requirements - Leadership of international manufacturing partners for module design evaluation, prototype builds, and qualification - Leadership of electro-optical module test definition and validation in Apple labs and at manufacturing sites - Detailed failure analysis of any issues affecting functionality and performance at module and product level - Frequent reporting to executive and multi-functional teams on development status of module development

NVIDIA is looking for an experienced Python Developer to join our Air team – the Digital Twin for Data Center Simulation web application. To learn more, visit https://air.nvidia.com. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our web applications. This position offers the opportunity to have a real impact in an influential, technology-focused company impacting product lines that power the most advanced data centers in the world. We have crafted a team of outstanding people, whose mission is to push the frontiers of what is possible today and define the platform for the future of data center simulation and design. What you'll be doing:

title: Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer
description: We’re seeking an experienced Machine Learning Engineer / Software Engineer (ML oriented), who will be integral to the data science feature development process, working in tandem with data engineering. You will design machine learning pipelines, apply algorithms to generate predictions and tackle data set challenges, and develop the first-ever, real-time corporate credit score platform. This isn't just another job. you'll be a key part of an exciting, experienced team in a fast-paced environment. You will:  Build forecasting/prediction models from scratch (POC) to production-ready Work closely in aligning the product, research, and development teams in crafting the product, increasing product effectiveness Take a critical role in the research process for finding the best market solutions for defined business problems Provide guidance to the R&D team and product teams  You have:  2+ years of experience as a Senior Software Engineer (ML), Machine Learning Engineer, Data Engineer, or in a similar role 4+ years of hands-on experience in engineering with Python Minimum 3-4 years of relevant experience: SQL complex queries (aggregations, analysis, etc.), as a strong cloud architect Degree in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, or equivalent experience Profound analytical skills and true love for data Extensive background in statistical analysis

title: Data and Insights Analyst
description: OGC is a boutique research and consulting agency specializing in data-driven strategy, quantitative analytics, and Customer Experience (CX) program design and optimization. We work with some of the world’s largest organizations across a variety of industries, including Financial Services, Specialty Retail, Telecommunications, Hospitality and Software, helping them to gain a deep understanding of their customers, develop actionable insights, and improve business processes.  We are seeking a full-time Data and Insights Analyst to join our team and support the development and execution of both our CX and Market research practices. This role provides a great opportunity for a curious, self-starter to become part of a high-performing team, and implement a hands-on approach to data exploration, manipulation, and database extraction automation. This will help our clients with mapping and documenting various data structures and platforms, eventually creating a curated, more approachable pattern of data retrieval. This is a full time position based in our Tel Aviv office with a hybrid work model.

title: Cloud Analyst - Student Position
description: Personetics is an B2B2C Enterprise-Software Fintech start-up that is leading the Self-Driving Finance revolution in banking. We help banks deliver highly intelligent and personalized banking experiences to their retail customers across all digital channels. We’re pioneering establishing a new category of consumer banking based around data-driven personalization and customer engagement serving over 120 million bank customers worldwide. title: Data & BI Analyst
description: Tel Aviv, Israel Job Type: Part Time About the Company At Tectu, you can make a real impact! As a Data & BI Analyst you will play a lead role in delivering data and business strategies, solutions and processes to support the data oriented projects. The ideal candidate is passionate about delivering cutting edge solutions to support the changing business needs and technology landscape. You will be working closely with others on our Product and Engineering teams to define and deliver these solutions.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our leading technology consulting team. In this role your responsibilities will be: Supporting the Market teams in building go to market strategies Translating business requirements to Data Science solutions leveraging strong business acumen Applying technical knowledge to architect solutions that meet business needs, AA/AI roadmaps, and contributing to architectures that enable the ability to scale to support additional modelling use cases Play a key role in the end-to-end delivery of AI solutions for our clients, from ideation, feasibility assessment, to data preparation, modelling and industrialization

title: LLM Principal Data Scientist – NLP Domain
description: Citi Innovation Lab in Tel Aviv is where dynamic projects are cultivated. The lab provides thought-leadership, technological solutions, and innovation to Citi’s global banking business. The AI/NLP group is the center of revolutionizing Citi's approach to handling data: including automated document processing, information and entity extraction, summarization, as well as data analysis based chatbots. We are actively working on developing and introducing cutting edge technologies, including LLMs. Combined text and image synergies and more. We are looking for multi talented candidates that can both drive thought leadership, manage teams as well as research and develop NLP technologies and frameworks custom tailored to Citi needs. The successful candidate will also be an influencer and be able to mentor and build their team members to grow professionally and personally. Finally, we expect our successful candidate to be able to work with internal clients and stakeholders to facilitate access to data, infrastructure and finally, deployment. Technology Applications Development Full time

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.

description: Every organization needs to protect its sensitive data and access to critical assets. We are building a security product designed to revolutionize and reshape how people and organizations access their most sensitive resources.  This unique solution combines many technologies and disciplines in a mission to build a cohesive security product, which aims to empower organizations to access and manage highly secure assets while staying productive and avoiding business disruption.  Aspart of the founding team of a new product group, you will have massive impact in shaping the next generation of secure remote access ecosystem in the security landscape. Headquartered in New York City, Innovid serves a global client base through offices across the Americas, Europe, and Asia Pacific. To learn more, visit innovid.com or follow us on LinkedIn or Twitter. description: Who We Are  Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we help clients with total transformation-inspiring complex change, enabling organizations to grow, building competitive advantage, and driving bottom-line impact.  To succeed, organizations must blend digital and human capabilities. Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives to spark change. title: AI Product Analyst student for Artificial Intelligence Group, Intel
description: Job Description  The AI Solutions Group is Intel's internal AI group. It is a global team of over 200 experts that uses AI to upgrade and transform Intel's critical operations. The group develops and deploys AI solutions across the company, from processor architecture and design, through manufacturing to sales. This yields both more then 1B of annual value for Intel and better products for its customers. Our AI Product Analysts Intel's AI product experts are essentially rock stars-they combine deep AI knowledge with product management best practices to create innovative and high value AI based products at scale. Our AI product experts engage with our customers to identify high business value problems that can be solved using AI, defining creative and high-end solutions that our data scientists and machine learning engineers can create. They also conduct deep data analysis using state-of-the-art technologies, collaborating with our data scientists to identify, create and evaluate the best algorithms to solve problems. Working diligently with our customers, our product analysts help implement and drive the highest business value possible from our solutions.               Intel's Information Technology Group (IT) designs, deploys and supports the information technology architecture and hardware/software applications for Intel. This includes the LAN, WAN, telephony, data centers, client PCs, backup and restore, and enterprise applications. IT is also responsible for e-Commerce development, data hosting and delivery of Web content and services. title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

title: Module Lead - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jul 11, 2023 Role Number:200490066 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops camera based sensing systems such as the user facing cameras, the revolutionary True Depth camera that powers FaceID and the eye tracking system on Apple Vision Pro. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The primary responsibility for this role is design and delivery of cutting edge camera and depth sensing modules, from concept through production ramp. Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. Responsibilities include: - Multi-functional leadership of optical, electrical and mechanical design teams to develop and integrate depth/camera hardware into products - Concept definition, design, and detailed trade studies for laser projectors, camera optics, sensors, and module packaging - Documentation of module-specific design, test, and manufacturing requirements - Leadership of international manufacturing partners for module design evaluation, prototype builds, and qualification - Leadership of electro-optical module test definition and validation in Apple labs and at manufacturing sites - Detailed failure analysis of any issues affecting functionality and performance at module and product level - Frequent reporting to executive and multi-functional teams on development status of module development

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Computer Vision and ML R&D Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: May 18, 2023 Role Number:200480486 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple is looking for a Computer Vision R&D student to creatively research, prototype and enable bleeding edge future Apple technologies and products based around depth, geometry and vision for Photography features. Our group develops and contributes to major Apple products such as the TrueDepth camera, Cinematic Mode, Portrait Mode, ARKit Scene Reconstruction and many more. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for many of Apple's greatest shipping products. We are looking for a creative and dedicated computer vision machine learning student, optimally with experience in stereo-vision, depth technologies, camera calibration, optimization and deep learning. As a member of a fast-paced team, you have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of people every day. YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITY WILL INCLUDE Develop and deliver high quality computer vision algorithms for existing and future Apple products. As a Computer Vision and ML R&D Student you will be responsible for exploring and prototyping on top of current and future technologies and products at Apple. The role requires you to have a deep curiosity and ability to understand complex software flows and neural networks design and validation while abstracting their core functionality to produce high quality concepts and prototype demos. Non-trivial research of cutting edge methodologies in stereo imaging, synthetic data, depth processing and neural networks optimization will be core parts of your day to day work. A basic familiarity with camera sensors (pinhole model, stereo) and machine learning and deep learning concepts are required as these form a basis for a lot of the work in the group. Cooperating with your team members to prepare presentations, papers, and talks to explain your inventions.

Heavy interaction with multidisciplinary design teams (electrical, mechanical, process, test, firmware, software and operations) requires the ability to understand a wide breadth of engineering and technical principles. title: Data and Insights Analyst

title: Depth Camera Calibration Student - Imaging & Sensing Technology Group
description: Summary Posted: Jan 23, 2023 Role Number:200454196 The Imaging and Sensing group at Apple develops depth sensing systems such as the ground-breaking True Depth camera that powers FaceID, as well as other cameras in Apple products. This multi-disciplinary group of engineers is responsible for architecture, design, and development of these highly complex sensing systems for Apple products. The Cameras and Depth Sensing team is looking for a system design engineer directly responsible for the design of calibration, simulation and test systems for new depth camera systems. This engineer works closely with Hardware Algorithm, Data Analysis and Operation groups to ensure the success of future Apple products. In this role, you will: * Develop, optimize and debug calibration and image processing algorithms & software in Matlab/C/Objective C * Design and specify the calibration and test methodology and stations according to product characters and quality requirements * Develop and optimize the entire station S/W solution * Qualify and debug the calibration and test station from system level down to component level, and improve station maturity * Deploy and monitor the stations, analyze large quantity station data, and formulate reports throughout the NPI cycle * Cooperate with cross functional teams to specify and implement test coverage

title: Backend Software Developer - Israel
description: ART MEDICAL is a well-funded medical startup, developing cutting-edge technologies for ICU patients. Our smART+™ platform is an intelligent, sensor-based feeding system for critical care patients that aims to prevent life-threatening, in-hospital complications, such as ventilator-associated pneumonia, malnutrition, and acute kidney injury. With the introduction of Nutrition Management 2.0™ to critical care patient scoring systems, the smART+™ platform monitors, analyzes and prevents malnutrition and gastric aspiration in real time. By providing optimal nutritional care and achieving up to 100% feeding efficiency, the smART+™ platform improves the standard of care and helps ICU patients recover faster. We are looking for a Backend Software Developer to join our interdisciplinary group of software, firmware, and hardware engineers.
